SEARCH
Package com.nnk.poseidon.controller

Class BidController

java.lang.Object
com.nnk.poseidon.controller.BidController
@Controller public class BidController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Bids. As the methods return views, @Controller is used instead of @RestController. Indeed, the response doesn't have to be serialized via @ResponseBody
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon

  • Method Details

    • remoteUser

      @ModelAttribute("remoteUser") public Object remoteUser(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      A method which retrieves the active user and registers it in the remoteUser attribute of the current Model in order to display the name of the connected user at the top of the page.
      Returns:
      An Object.

    • get_bidListPage

      @GetMapping("/bid/list") public String get_bidListPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A GetMapping method on the /bid/list URI with a Model as parameter. It calls the IBidService method getBidList() in order to get Model attribute, before returning the URI of a template page.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid list page.

    • get_bidAddForm

      @GetMapping("/bid/add") public String get_bidAddForm(Bid bid)
      A GetMapping method on the /bid/add URI. It only returns the URI of a template page.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid add form page.

    • get_bidUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/bid/update/{id}") public String get_bidUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A GetMapping method on the /bid/update URI with a bid id as PathVariable and a Model as parameter. It calls the IBidService method getBidById(int id) in order to get Model attribute, before returning the URI of a template page of the current bid.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid update form page.
      Error thrown :
      NO_CONTENT if the bid concerned doesn't exist.

    • postBid_fromBidAddForm

      @PostMapping("/bid/validate") public String postBid_fromBidAddForm(@Valid @Valid Bid bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      A PostMapping method on the /bid/validate URI with a valid Bid and a Model as parameter. It calls the IBidService method addOrUpdateBid(Bid bid) in order to save the new bid in the database. Then, it redirects to the bid list page.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid add form.

    • putBid_fromBidUpdateForm

      @PutMapping("/bid/update/{id}") public String putBid_fromBidUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @Valid @Valid Bid bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      A PutMapping method on the /bid/update URI with a bid id as PathVariable, a valid Bid and a Model as parameter. It calls the IBidService method addOrUpdateBid(Bid bid) in order to update, in the database, the bid whose id is passed in parameter. Then, it redirects to the bid list page.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid update form.

    • deleteBid_fromBidListPage

      @RequestMapping("/bid/delete/{id}") public String deleteBid_fromBidListPage(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      A RequestMapping method on the /bid/delete URI with a bid id as PathVariable. It calls the IBidService method deleteBidById(int id). Then, it redirects to the bid list page.
      Returns:
      A template view URI as String.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      Bid list page.
      Error thrown :
      NO_CONTENT if the bid concerned doesn't exist.
